channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 11:36 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Cont attention, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 11:36 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Cont attention, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#Pokrovskaya_T territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 11:33 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 11:33 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
